attributes.action: Abolish any legislation to legalise I. D. Cards. They infringe our human rights!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are totally against the tyrannical introduction of I. D. cards. This is the thin end of the wedge to introduce the 'Mark of the Beast' spoken of in Revelation 13:16. If we allow this to go ahead, you can say goodbye to freedom and liberty that we have enjoyed in this country for centuries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
